<script>
$('li.micoach a').addClass('sf-with-ul');
</script>

<script>
var type, promotion, link, slotNumber = 1, heroPromotions = new Array(), i = 0;

// Cycle through all available Content Slots in this order
$(".hp-slot-1, #hp-slot-2, #hp-slot-3, #hp-slot-4, .shp-slot-1, .shp-slot-2, #shp-slot-3, #shp-slot-4, #shp-slot-5, #shp-slot-6, #shp-slot-7, #glp-slot-1, #glp-slot-2, #glp-slot-3, #glp-slot-4, #glp-slot-5, #clp-slot-1, #clp-slot-2, #clp-slot-3, #clp-slot-4, #clp-slot-5, #clp-slot-6").each(function() {   
     // Type
     type = 'slot-' + slotNumber;

     // Cycle through all Hero Elements
     $(this).find('.slide').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

          // Hero on SHP, GLP and CLP
          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
         
          // Store Asset Names in Array for HP Hero (see next block)
          heroPromotions[i] = $(this).data('contentasset');        
          i++;
         
     });

     // Hero on HP
     i = 0;
     $(this).find('.slide_link_wrapper').each(function() {
          promotion = heroPromotions[i];

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });

          i++;
     });   

     // Link Area   
     i = 1;
     $(this).find('.glp-menu ul, .clp-menu ul').each(function() {
          promotion = 'linkfarm-column-' + i;

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });

          i++;
     });             


     // Feature
     $(this).find('.features_slot .block').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
     });   


     // Team        
     $(this).find('.teams_slot .block > div').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
     });   


     // Brandpromo        
     $(this).find('.brandspromo_slot .block').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).data('contentasset');

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
     });   


     // Brandshop
     $(this).find('.brandshop').each(function() {
          promotion = $(this).find('.brandspromoasset').data('contentasset');

          $(this).find('a').each(function() {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', type.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());
          });
     });   

     slotNumber++;
});

// Header
$(".categorymenu .topcat_list_item").each(function(index) {  
     var currentTopcatListItem = $(this).find('a.topcat_link, a.shop');

     if(currentTopcatListItem.length > 0) {   
          promotion  = currentTopcatListItem.text();
          link = promotion;

          currentTopcatListItem.attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header' + '-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase());

          $(this).find('.subcategorymenu a').each(function(index) {
               link = $(this).text();

               $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );
          });      
     }
});

// Customer Data
$("#header .headercustomerinfo").each(function(index) {   
     $(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
          link = $(this).text();

          $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header-_-customerinfo-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );        
     });   
});

// Subnav
$(".subnav").each(function(index) {   
     $(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
          link = $(this).text();

          $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'header-_-subnav-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );        
     });   
});

// Contextual Mastheads in Grid
$("#main-area .plp-masthead-container").each(function(index) {    
	var segment = $(this).find('h2').text();
	
	$(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
		link = $(this).text();

		$(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'plp_masthead-_-' + segment +  '-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );         
	});    
});

// Footer
$("#footer .footer-copy ul").each(function(index) {   
     promotion = $(this).find('h5').text();

     $(this).find('a').each(function(index) {
          link = $(this).text();

          $(this).attr('manual_cm_sp', 'footer-_-' + promotion.toLowerCase() + '-_-' + link.toLowerCase() );        
     });   
});
</script>

<script>
$('.subcategorymenu').slice(0,2).css({'margin-left': 0, 'left': 0});
</script>

	setTimeout(function() {
		if($(".orbit-wrapper").length > 0) {
			$(".orbit-wrapper").find('.title, .intro').addClass('text-shadow');
		}

	}, 500);  // will work with every browser
});
</script>

	$('a.video-dialog').click(function(event) {

		app.dialog.open(

				"width":853, 
				"height":500, 
				"dialogClass":"video", 
				"close": function(event, ui){
					jQuery(this).dialog("destroy")
				}
			}
		);
	});
</script>
